entry <- "download"

solutions <- function(){
  FALSE
}

l = readLines("secret")
masterseed = l[length(l)]

seed <- reactive({
  
  req(!is.null(input$assignment))

  if(masterseed == "") stop("Master seed cannot be blank!")
    
  salt = all_assignment_data[[input$assignment]]$`seed-salt`
  seed = flexTeaching:::animalSeed(masterseed, salt)
  
  return(seed)

})
